html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02592023-03-23FIN
ActBretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Finance to Provide Financial Assistance to Ukraine
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE up to $2.4 billion in the form of a sovereign loan under the Bretton Woods and Related Agreements Act (the Act) during the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements set out in subsection 8.3(4) of the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 and the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Bretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
subject: Order Authorizing the Minister of Finance to Provide Financial Assistance to Ukraine
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE up to $2.4 billion in the form of a sovereign loan under the Bretton Woods and Related Agreements Act (the Act) during the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements set out in subsection 8.3(4) of the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 and the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
